name: check_availability
description: Check if specific gaming stations are available for a requested date and time slot. This checks for existing bookings and active sessions to prevent double bookings.

request_body_schema.description: Request body for checking station availability

properties.name: station_id
properties.description: Station ID(s) to check. Can be a single station ID or comma-separated IDs for multiple stations (e.g., 'station-id-1,station-id-2')

properties.name: start_time
properties.description: Start time in HH:MM format using 24-hour clock (e.g., 14:00 for 2:00 PM, 09:00 for 9:00 AM)

properties.name: end_time
properties.description: End time in HH:MM format using 24-hour clock (e.g., 15:00 for 3:00 PM, 10:00 for 10:00 AM)
